Quaternions Documentation

About

The file quaternions.h implements the class H representing Hamilton's quaternions. To use this in a C++ program copy this file to your program's directory and use the directive #include "quaternions.h" in any file in which you wish to use quaternions.

The quaternion class is named H since quaternions are usually denoted by a bold H. For convenience, this file also defines R for real numbers (type double and C for complex numbers (type complex<double>). The class and all its methods and related procedures are defined inline in this header file; there is no .cc file.
